item.title: Suspected abandoned vehicle, 29th June
item.description:
The vehicle -- a white Fiat 500, reg no: BK09ZDA -- first appeared outside no. 95 Hillcrest Road over 5 weeks ago. At the time, the residents of both 93 and 95 Hillcrest Road were away for a few days; no other neighbours reported having seen the vehicle or driver when it was left in it's current location, and no neighbours within 3 or 4 houses either side of no.95 recognise the vehicle. The road is a relatively quiet cul-de-sac, some distance from any rail stations; therefore, since the vehicle has not moved from it's current location nor has any person been seen to visit the vehicle in the 5 weeks it has been parked here, it is assumed that the vehicle has been abandoned.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hillcrest Road, Sundridge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 4 black rubbish bags just dumped, 29th June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Peckham Road, Camberwell, London
